timeline.message: returnning invalid option supplied error message on invalid version number given to --diff-version

timeline.bodyText: Can you also test that the second value cannot be smaller (or equal to) the first value? It doesn't make sense to allow that.
timeline.author: eshryane

replies.bodyText:
I thought about that but I held back because:


Judging from the tests, this seems to be the intended behaviour (at least as at 2013 when it was implemented). If you look at:
def "--diff-versions (forward range)"() and def "--diff-versions (inverse range)"() they test that both 2:1 and 1:2 works.


Making such change would also be a breaking change. Since one cant really consider the current behaviour a bug, I hesitate to turn it into a breaking change


Do let me know if this changes your thoughts or not
replies.author: dadepo

replies.bodyText: Fair enough, it's been working as-is for long enough not to introduce a breaking change now. I'm fine to leave it out
replies.author: eshryane
